markdownRemark.html: The Google Udacity India Scholarship Hey Guys, There’s nothing new in this but you found something special I thought that hold you guys to think for a sec. I am not good a writing . This Scholarships give me hope for that Why should I code because before this I just code it’s just like hobby to me. So, this story takes only 5 minutes of your precious time and I am sorry all of you for that. My grammar is not quite good.And I hope it be quite interesting for you. So, Here’s my story start.

frontmatter.title: How Uadcity gave more confidence to me?
